title: Amorim’s make or break summer: The attacking superstars who are topping Manchester United’s wishlist
description: While there might have been plenty of excitement around Old Trafford back in November following Ruben Amorim’s arrival, Manchester United broke a string of unwanted records last season. With many fans around the red half of Manchester making their frustrations abundantly clear following a woeful 15th-place finish, the former Sporting Lisbon boss already has a […] The post Amorim’s make or break summer: The attacking superstars who are topping Manchester United’s wishlist appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Tom Dunstan

title: Lage interested in Joao Felix return to Benfica for the right price
description: Benfica head coach Bruno Lage is keen to strike a deal to bring Joao Felix back to the club, though he acknowledged the financial challenges in signing the Chelsea forward. Joao Felix left the Primeira Liga side in 2019 to join Atletico Madrid in a move worth €126m. author: SoccerNews
